description: This header file declares internal API functions for the Slap Bmc2 Application Object, part of the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP) in the BroadWay Service Delivery System. It provides prototypes for functions related to state management and access control within the application.

methods.name: SlapBmc2AppoGetSlapGoaIf
methods.description: Retrieves the SLA GoA Interface handle associated with the application object.

methods.name: SlapBmc2AppoGetOlmContainer
methods.description: Retrieves the OLM Container handle associated with the application object.

methods.name: SlapBmc2AppoReset
methods.description: Resets the internal state of the application object.

methods.name: SlapBmc2AppoLock
methods.description: Locks the application object for thread-safe access.

methods.name: SlapBmc2AppoUnlock
methods.description: Unlocks the application object after thread-safe access.
